name: Commands
description:
An overview of some of the current commands, note work is ongoing. If you find an issue let an immortal know!

No commands are case specific

Help TOPIC
General Help Command.
North / n
Move north
East / e
Move eastward
West / w
Move west
South / s
Move south.
Up / u
Move up.
Down / d
Move down.
Chat MESSAGE
Message everyone logged into the game.
Say MESSAGE
Message everyone in the current room.
Tell PLAYER MESSAGE
Private message given player.
Reply MESSAGE
Reply to the person who privately IMed you last (with tell command).
Yell MESSAGE
Message everyone in the current area -- areas are collections of rooms.
Who
List the visible players connected to the game.
Score
View your characters stat card.
Title NEW TITLE
Set your characters title.
Where
Visible players in this area.
Equipment / eq
Worn equipment.
Inventory / i
Your Inventory.
Get ITEM NAME
Get an item found within a room. Get all will grab everything.
Drop ITEM NAME
Drop an item found within your invetory into the room. Drop all will drop everything.
Remove ITEM NAME
Remove a worn item.
